text:
In the second paragraph the first sentence:

"The presented content is mainly derived, with permission by the author, from 
the article Introducing SSL and Certificates using SSLeay from Frederick J. 
Hirsch"

contains two broken links. The following error is returned:

The requested URL /fhirsch/Papers/wwwj/index.html was not found on this server.
creator: MHenry@lastminute.com

text: The links are fixed and should be up the next days. Thanks for using Apache 2.0!
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
